detaileddescription.para: < Default peripheral bus reference clock defintion

briefdescription.para: board timer 1ms means what HZ count
board ms counter convention based on the global timer counter
Board init routine MUST be called in each application.

simplesect.para: It is better to disable interrupts when calling this function remember to enable interrupt when you want to use them

briefdescription.para: Update timer counter and other MS period operation in cycling interrupt and must be called periodically.

detaileddescription.para:
When the OS timer interrupt is in conflict with the bare-metal timer interrupt, put this function into the OS timer interrupt
precision
interrupt-period precision in Hz

this function needs a 1-MS timer interrupt to work. For bare-metal, it is implemented in this file. For OS, you must call board_timer_update in the OS 1-MS timer interrupt when the bare-metal timer interrupt is not ready
ms
MS to delay
os_compat
Enable or disable When this delay is enabled, use the OS delay function, if one is provided. See OSP_DELAY_OS_COMPAT_ENABLE and OSP_DELAY_OS_COMPAT_DISABLE

briefdescription.para: get current passed us since timer init
